shapes
Class Line

java.lang.Object
  shapes.Shape
      shapes.Line

public class Line
extends Shape

Represents a line defined by the x and y coordinates of the two endpoints of the line.

Version:
9/27/15
Author:
Ashley Helfinstein

            int y,
            int x2,
            int y2)
Sets up a line with the given locations of the endpoints

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate of the first endpoint
y - the y coordinate of the first endpoint
x2 - the x coordinate of the second endpoint
y2 - the y coordinate of the second endpoint

Line

public Line(int x,
            int y,
            double angle,
            double length)
Sets up a line with the given first endpoint, angle and length

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate of the first endpoint
y - the y coordinate of the first endpoint
angle - the angle of the line (in radians)
length - the length of the line

Draws this line using the PApplet passed as an argument

Overrides:
draw in class Shape

findCircleX

public double findCircleX(Line other)
finds the x coordinate of the circle to be drawn at the intersection point

Parameters:
other - the other line that might intersect the line the method is called on
Returns:
double-the x coordinate of the intersection of the two lines (where the circle will later be drawn)
Precondition:
other!= null

findCircleY

public double findCircleY(Line other)
finds the y coordinate of the intersection point

Parameters:
other - the other line that might intersect the line the method is called on
Returns:
double-the y coordinate of the intersection of the two lines
Precondition:
other != null

intersects

public boolean intersects(Line other)
Returns true if this line segment and the segment other intersect each other. Returns false if they do not intersect.

Parameters:
other - the other line with which to check the intersection
Returns:
boolean-whether the two lines intersect
